data.eml:eml: New insights in Trichochloritis Pilsbry, 1891 and its relatives (Gastropoda, Pulmonata, Camaenidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pall-Gergely, Barna, Neubert, Eike (2019): New insights in Trichochloritis Pilsbry, 1891 and its relatives (Gastropoda, Pulmonata, Camaenidae). ZooKeys 865: 137-154, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.865.36296, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.865.36296
